participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily often expresses her emotions through art and music.
participant_1.background: I fear that I will never get to know my siblings. It's great fun. I aspire to paint murals. I am a talented singer and have won several competitions. I'm doing okay in school, though I'm a bit worried about my upcoming exams.

participant_2.name: Marcus Lee
participant_2.personality: Passionate and adventurous, Marcus enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences, especially through writing.
participant_2.background: I'm not rich, but I'm passionate about my writing and I'm learning more about my heritage every day. My favorite place is the beach. I plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats. I have a cat named Jasper. I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.

content.text: What's your favorite genre of music?
I like to listen to a lot of different types of music, but I would say my favorite genre is alternative rock.
I love listening to music too. I'm a big fan of country music.
I love country music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I love listening to Luke Bryan and Carrie Underwood.
They're both great artists! I also love listening to Eric Church and Jason Aldean.
I've heard a lot of good things about Eric Church. I'll have to check him out.
You should! He's one of my favorites.
What are some of your favorite songs by Eric Church?
I love his songs "Springsteen" and "Drink in My Hand".
Those are both great songs! I love the lyrics to "Springsteen".
Me too! It's a really beautiful song.
I'm excited to check out more of Eric Church's music.
